member.name: M:PdfiumViewer.CustomScrollControl.IsInputKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
member.returns: true if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PdfiumViewer.NativeMethods.FPDF_LoadCustomDocument(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Opens a document using a .NET Stream. Allows opening huge PDFs without loading them into memory first.
member.param: The input Stream. Don't dispose prior to closing the pdf.
Password, if the PDF is protected. Can be null.
Retrieves an IntPtr to the COM object for the Stream. The caller must release this with Marshal.Release prior to Disposing the Stream.
member.returns: An IntPtr to the FPDF_DOCUMENT object.

member.name: T:PdfiumViewer.PdfPrintMode
member.summary: Specifies the mode in which the document should be printed.
member.remarks: Printers have a hard margin. This is a (small) margin on which it is not possible to print. PdfPrintMode specifies whether the page should be scaled to fit into this margin, or that the margin should be cut off of the page.

member.name: F:PdfiumViewer.PdfPrintMode.ShrinkToMargin
member.summary: Shrink the print area to fall within the hard printer margin.

member.name: F:PdfiumViewer.PdfPrintMode.CutMargin
member.summary: Cut the hard printer margin from the output.

member.name: T:PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags
member.summary: Flags that influence the page rendering process.

member.name: F:PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.None
member.summary: No flags.

member.name: F:PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.ForPrinting
member.summary: Render for printing.

member.name: F:PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.Annotations
member.summary: Set if annotations are to be rendered.

member.name: F:PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.LcdText
member.summary: Set if using text rendering optimized for LCD display.

member.name: F:PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.NoNativeText
member.summary: Don't use the native text output available on some platforms.

member.name: F:PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.Grayscale
member.summary: Grayscale output.

member.name: F:PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.LimitImageCacheSize
member.summary: Limit image cache size.

member.name: F:PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.ForceHalftone
member.summary: Always use halftone for image stretching.

member.name: F:PdfiumViewer.PdfRenderFlags.Transparent
member.summary: Render with a transparent background.
